Schema: {"typeName":"Datadog::Integrations::AWSAccount","description":"Datadog AWS Account Integration 1.0.0","typeConfiguration":{"properties":{"DatadogCredentials":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DatadogCredentials"}},"additionalProperties":false},"definitions":{"DatadogCredentials":{"description":"Credentials for the Datadog API","properties":{"ApiKey":{"description":"Datadog API key","type":"string"},"ApplicationKey":{"description":"Datadog application key","type":"string"},"ApiURL":{"description":"Datadog API URL (defaults to https://api.datadoghq.com)","type":"string"}},"required":["ApiKey","ApplicationKey"],"type":"object","additionalProperties":false}},"properties":{"AccountID":{"description":"Your AWS Account ID without dashes.","type":"string"},"AWSPartition":{"description":"The AWS partition to use. This should be set to 'aws' for commercial accounts, 'aws-us-gov' for GovCloud accounts, and 'aws-cn' for China accounts.","type":"string","enum":["aws","aws-us-gov","aws-cn"]},"AuthConfig":{"description":"The configuration for the AWS role delegation.","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"RoleName":{"description":"Your Datadog role delegation name.","type":"string"}},"required":["RoleName"]},"AWSRegions":{"description":"The configuration for which regions to collect data from.","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"IncludeOnly":{"description":"Array of AWS regions to include from metrics collection.","type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string"}},"IncludeAll":{"description":"Collect data for all AWS regions.","type":"boolean"}}},"MetricsConfig":{"description":"The configuration for ingesting AWS Metrics into Datadog.","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"Enabled":{"description":"Enable the infrastructure monitoring Datadog product for this AWS Account. This will enable collecting all AWS metrics in your account.","type":"boolean","default":true},"AutomuteEnabled":{"description":"Enable EC2 automute for AWS metrics","type":"boolean","default":true},"CollectCloudwatchAlarms":{"description":"Enable CloudWatch alarms collection","type":"boolean","default":false},"CollectCustomMetrics":{"description":"Enable custom metrics collection","type":"boolean","default":false},"TagFilters":{"description":"The array of EC2 tags (in the form key:value) defines a filter that Datadog uses when collecting metrics from EC2.","type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"Namespace":{"type":"string"},"Tags":{"type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string"}}}}},"NamespaceFilters":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"IncludeOnly":{"description":"Array of AWS namespaces to include from metrics collection. Only one of IncludeOnlyNamespaces or ExcludeNamespaces can be set.","type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string"}},"ExcludeOnly":{"description":"Array of AWS namespaces to exclude from metrics collection. Only one of IncludeOnlyNamespaces or ExcludeNamespaces can be set.","type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"AccountTags":{"description":"Array of tags (in the form key:value) to add to all hosts and metrics reporting through this integration.","type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string"}},"ResourcesConfig":{"description":"The configuration for ingesting AWS Resources into Datadog.","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"CSPMResourceCollection":{"description":"Enable the compliance and security posture management Datadog product. This will enable collecting information on your AWS resources and providing security validation.","type":"boolean","default":false},"ExtendedResourceCollection":{"description":"Enable collecting information on your AWS resources for use in Datadog products such as Network Process Monitoring.","type":"boolean","default":false}}},"LogsConfig":{"description":"The configuration for ingesting AWS Logs into Datadog.","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"LambdaForwarder":{"description":"The configuration for Lambda Log Forwarders.","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"Lambdas":{"description":"List of Datadog Lambda Log Forwarder ARNs","type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string"}},"Sources":{"description":"List of AWS services that will send logs to the Datadog Lambda Log Forwarder.","type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"TracesConfig":{"description":"The configuration for ingesting AWS Traces into Datadog.","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"XRayServices":{"description":"The services to collect X-Ray traces from.","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"IncludeOnly":{"description":"Array of services to collect traces for.","type":"array","insertionOrder":true,"uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string"}},"IncludeAll":{"description":"Collect traces for all services.","type":"boolean"}}}}},"Id":{"description":"Unique Datadog ID of the AWS Account Integration Config. To get the config ID for an account, use the [List all AWS integrations](https://docs.datadoghq.com/api/latest/aws-integration/#list-all-aws-integrations) endpoint and query by AWS Account ID.","type":"string"},"ExternalIDSecretName":{"description":"The name of the AWS SecretsManager secret created in your account to hold this integration's `external_id`. Defaults to `DatadogIntegrationExternalID`. Cannot be referenced from created resource.","type":"string"}},"required":["AuthConfig","AWSPartition"],"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/Id"],"createOnlyProperties":["/properties/AccountID","/properties/AuthConfig/RoleName"],"readOnlyProperties":["/properties/Id"],"additionalProperties":false,"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":["secretsmanager:CreateSecret"]},"read":{"permissions":[]},"update":{"permissions":[]},"delete":{"permissions":["secretsmanager:DeleteSecret","secretsmanager:DescribeSecret"]}}}
